attributes.additional_details: We need to dramatically reduce the borders we have no jobs not houses and no money left! We are catering for foreign country's who have not contributed towards tax, if people are to come in to the country then they have to have a excellent trade, job waiting for them and money to pay for there own home. No loophole to get in to England by getting married or having a child with a English person to get in. If you agree with this petition please sign
